TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OutlookBarGroupsEvents_BeforeGroupRemoveEventHandler(OutlookBarGroup Group, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed OutlookBarGroupsEvents_BeforeGroupRemoveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OutlookBarGroupsEvents_BeforeGroupRemoveEventHandler(Group As OutlookBarGroup, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void OutlookBarGroupsEvents_BeforeGroupRemoveEventHandler(OutlookBarGroup ^ Group, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: O OutlookBarGroup que está sendo removido.
False quando o evento ocorre. Se o procedimento de evento define este argumento como True, o grupo não é removido do painel atalhos.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
